title: Tech Hackathon 2025
description: A 48-hour coding challenge to solve local community problems. Join teams of developers, designers, and innovators to create solutions that address real challenges in our community.
details: Open to participants of all skill levels

title: Women in Tech Summit
description: Celebrating and empowering women in technology fields. This summit brings together women in tech to share experiences, learn from each other, and inspire the next generation of female technologists.
details: Panel discussions on challenges and opportunities

title: Youth Innovation Showcase
description: Working towards showcasing solutions to save the world from climate changes. This event highlights the creativity and ingenuity of youth in our community, providing them with a platform to showcase their ideas and receive feedback.
